author: Jacob Gallagher
title: Why Does Kanye West Dress Like a Construction Worker?
text:
KANYE WEST wears a lot of camo. Camo bucket hats, camo parkas, camo T-shirts, camo cargos. Over the years, the 40-year-old rapper has been seen in a barrack’s worth of camo. And now, Mr. West’s camo-obsession might bring him to a courtroom. Two weeks ago, in a Georgia court, Jordan Outdoor Enterprises Ltd. (the parent company of Realtree camo) filed a federal copyright infringement lawsuit against Mr. West’s Yeezy Apparel LLC fashion label.

The lawsuit alleges that a representative of Yeezy contacted J.O.E.L. in 2016 about... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
